artist: Artist: Chris Boarts Larson; Publisher: Slug & Lettuce, Richmond, Va.
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: A single, folded leaf with text on the outside and on the inside a xerographic photo-collage of punk performers, featuring "SLUG & LETTUCE" across the top.
title: Slug & Lettuce: A Little Bit O' History
